1370: Ghiselijn was born in De Tuyt in 1370.
Got married to Sybillia at age 29 in 1370.
Had a son with Sybillia, Betten, at age 29.
1371: Had a daughter with Sybillia, Heylewigis, at age 30.
1372: Had a son with Sybillia, Arnekin, at age 31.
1373: Had a daughter with Sybillia, Esa, at age 32.
1377: Had a son with Sybillia, Isbrandus, at age 36.
1378: Had a son with Sybillia, Willai, at age 37.
1380: Had a daughter with Sybillia, Lelien, at age 39.
1381: Lost son Betten when Betten was 12 years old.
1385: Lost his wife Sybillia while she was giving birth to Tijs in 1385.
